django-tables2 - An app for creating HTML tablesÂ¶

django-tables2 turns data into HTML tables. Features:

  • Pagination
  • Ordering
  • Extendable
  • Class based view
  • Supports for queryset and list data
  • Themes

Report bugs at http://github.com/bradleyayers/django-tables2/issues
